link

@Deprecated
public static void link(Activity context,
                                   SocializeAuthListener listener)
Deprecated. 

Links the current user to a facebook account. The user will be presented with the Facebook authentication dialog.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

link

@Deprecated
public static void link(Activity context,
                                   SocializeAuthListener listener,
                                   String... permissions)
Deprecated. 

Links the current user to a facebook account with custom FB permissions. The user will be presented with the Facebook authentication dialog.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
listener - A listener to handle the result.
permissions - One or more permissions defined by http://developers.facebook.com/docs/authentication/permissions/

link

@Deprecated
public static void link(Activity context,
                                   String token,
                                   boolean verifyPermissions,
                                   SocializeAuthListener listener)
Deprecated. 

Links an existing Facebook access token with the current user. No authentication dialog will be shown.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
token - The Facebook access token.
verifyPermissions - If true this method will also verify that the permissions assigned to the given token match the default permissions required by Socialize. If not an authentication with FB will be attempted. If this parameter is false it is ASSUMED that permissions are valid.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

unlink

public static void unlink(Context context)
Removes the Facebook credentials from the current user.

Parameters:
context - The current context.

Removes the Facebook credentials from the current user.

@Deprecated
public static boolean isLinked(Context context)
Deprecated. 

Returns true if the current user is already linked to Facebook.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Returns:
True if the current user has linked their Facebook account.

isAvailable

public static boolean isAvailable(Context context)
Returns true if this application has Facebook configured. Minimum requirement is a Facebook app ID.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
Returns:
True if the Facebook has been configured for this application.

setAppId

public static void setAppId(Context context,
                            String appId)
Sets a Facebook App ID for this application. NOTE: This will not persist between app sessions. It is recommended that the app ID be set in socialize.properties under the key facebook.app.id

Parameters:
context - The current context.
appId - The Facebook app id, obtained from http://developers.facebook.com/apps

getAccessToken

public static String getAccessToken(Context context)
Returns the Facebook access token for the current user.

Returns:
The access token or null if the user is not linked to Facebook.

postEntity

public static void postEntity(Activity context,
                              Entity entity,
                              String text,
                              SocialNetworkShareListener listener)
Posts an entity to the user's Facebook wall. Post data can be customized by implementing the onBeforePost method in the given SocialNetworkListener.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
entity - The Socialize entity to which the post corresponds (Required)
text - The text for the post.
listener - A listnener to handle callbacks from the post.

post

public static void post(Activity context,
                        String graphPath,
                        Map<String,Object> params,
                        SocialNetworkPostListener listener)
Calls the Facebook graph API directly with a POST. This will NOT create a share object in Socialize and is simply a raw call to Facebook. NOTE: The current user must first be authenticated using a call to 'link'. This method is asynchronous and can be run from the main UI thread.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
graphPath - The path on the Facebook graph api to be called for the CURRENT user. E.g. me/feed
params - The data to be sent in the request.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

get

public static void get(Activity context,
                       String graphPath,
                       Map<String,Object> params,
                       SocialNetworkPostListener listener)
Calls the Facebook graph API directly with a GET. This will NOT create a share object in Socialize and is simply a raw call to Facebook. NOTE: The current user must first be authenticated using a call to 'link'. This method is asynchronous and can be run from the main UI thread.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
graphPath - The path on the Facebook graph api to be called for the CURRENT user. E.g. me/feed
params - The data to be sent in the request.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

delete

public static void delete(Activity context,
                          String graphPath,
                          Map<String,Object> params,
                          SocialNetworkPostListener listener)
Calls the Facebook graph API directly with a DELETE. This will NOT create a share object in Socialize and is simply a raw call to Facebook. NOTE: The current user must first be authenticated using a call to 'link'. This method is asynchronous and can be run from the main UI thread.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
graphPath - The path on the Facebook graph api to be called for the CURRENT user. E.g. me/feed
params - The data to be sent in the request.
listener - A listener to handle the result.

getImageForPost

public static byte[] getImageForPost(Activity context,
                                     Uri imagePath)
                              throws IOException
Returns image data suitable for posting to facebook.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
imagePath - The path to the image.
Returns:
A byte array containing the bytes to be posted.
Throws:
IOException

getImageForPost

public static byte[] getImageForPost(Activity context,
                                     Bitmap image,
                                     Bitmap.CompressFormat format)
                              throws IOException
Returns image data suitable for posting to facebook.

Parameters:
context - The current context.
image - The image to be compressed.
format - The compression format to use (one of JPEG or PNG).
Returns:
A byte array containing the bytes to be posted.
Throws:
IOException

extendAccessToken

@Deprecated
public static void extendAccessToken(Activity context,
                                                SocializeAuthListener listener)
Deprecated. Use onResume()

Extends the user's Facebook access token if needed.

Parameters:
context - The current context
listener - A listener to handle the result after re-authentication with Socialize.

onResume

public static void onResume(Activity context,
                            SocializeAuthListener listener)
Should be called in the onResume method of any activities using Socialize. This is called automatically by in the Socialize.onResume() method.

Parameters:
context -
listener -

getCurrentPermissions

public static void getCurrentPermissions(Activity context,
                                         String token,
                                         OnPermissionResult callback)
Retrieves the current permissions for token provided.

Parameters:
parent - The current context.
token - The token for which we are going to retrieve permissions.
callback - A callback to handle the response.

getHashKeys

public static String[] getHashKeys(Activity context)
                            throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
Returns the hash key used to authenticate this application with Facebook. Useful for debugging.

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
Throws:
NoSuchAlgorithmException
